about_the_game:
You play as a woman in her late 20's, struggling with the responsibility of balancing the intricacies of your relationships and your own mental stability, whilst also seeking the truth behind the mysterious death of your husband. You must navigate through a web of secrets involving a mysterious cult, personal traumas, and complex relationships.

As you uncover clues and interact with a cast of intriguing characters, including the charismatic yet enigmatic streamer Ren, and the supportive yet distant Ryota, you must balance your sanity and emotions to piece together the truth. Your decisions shape the narrative, leading to multiple endings that reflect the consequences of your choices. Dive into this immersive visual novel to unravel the enigma and discover the hidden truths of "Lover's Enigma."

Your interactions and choices influence your relationships with other characters. Find and Interact with characters hanging around the town during your investigations, Succeeding in Rhythm-based QTE and giving gifts to characters will raise your affection levels with them as well!

  • 5 Love Interests you can meet and many more NPCS

  • 5 Different routes for each love interests

  • Diverse choice system that affects the various endings

  • At least 10 different endings that can be obtained

  • Various CG's that can be revisted in the gallery

content_descriptors.notes:
"Koibito no Nazo" contains mature themes and content that may not be suitable for all audiences. Players should be aware of the following:

Violence: The game includes depictions of physical violence, including murder and psychological manipulation.

Self-Harm and Suicide: The storyline involves themes of self-harm and suicide, including a character who dies under suspicious circumstances that appear as a suicide.

Mental Health Issues: Themes of depression, anxiety, and PTSD are present, as characters cope with traumatic experiences and their aftermath.

Players who may be sensitive to these themes are advised to proceed with caution. Our aim is to handle these topics with care and respect while delivering a compelling and immersive experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU (AMD FX-4300 or Intel i3-4130 or newer)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD / NVIDIA dedicated graphics card, with at least 2GB of dedicated VRAM and Shader Model 5.1 support (AMD R9 285 and NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or newer)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 9 compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU (AMD Ryzen 3 1300x or Intel i7-930 or newer)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD / NVIDIA dedicated graphics card, with 6GB of dedicated VRAM and Shader Model 6.0/6.1 support (i.e. AMD RX 580 8GB and NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or newer)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 9 compatible soundcard

short_description: In Lover's Enigma , you investigate your husband's mysterious death while balancing complex relationships and personal trauma. Navigate a web of secrets involving a hidden cult and key characters. Your choices shape the story and lead to multiple endings.
